hero.title: All-in-One Video Enhancements
hero.subtitle: 30+ features in one, the ultimate video experience enhancement browser extension with multi-platform support, helping you easily master your video experience.

features.title: Absolute Privacy Protection
features.desc: The extension does not collect any user information and we use Chrome's built-in API to ensure user privacy and security.

features.title: Extensive Platform Support
features.desc: Supports all websites and platforms using HTML5 video, enjoy enhanced experience anytime, anywhere.

features.title: 30+ Features
features.desc: 30+ features in one, no need to download multiple extensions, one extension handles all your needs. Not just rotation, zoom, picture-in-picture, stretch, loop, speed control, VR, screenshot, filters, download... but also volume enhancement, audio delay, pitch adjustment, 3D surround effects, and more.

features.title: Built-in Independent Web Player
features.desc: For features not supported by local players, you can directly upload video files to Video Roll for playback and enjoy all Video Roll features.

features.title: Customizable Shortcuts
features.desc: Support custom shortcuts, operate more efficiently and conveniently without opening the extension.

features.title: YouTube Feature Enhancement
features.desc: For YouTube, provides automatic ad detection and accelerated playback (not ad blocking), and video AI summarization. Making your YouTube experience richer.

features.title: Multi-window Sync
features.desc: Sync playback progress across multiple windows, switch more freely.

features.title: Volume Enhancement
features.desc: Increase volume limit, hear more clearly.

features.title: Subtitle Translation
features.desc: One-click subtitle translation, barrier-free across languages.

advantages.title: Open Source
advantages.desc: Open source code, safe and reliable

reviews.comment: Ad skip is awesome, great experience.

privacy.title: Data and Privacy Statement
privacy.intro: We take your data security and privacy protection very seriously. This plugin promises:

policies.0: Your personal information is only used for account login and basic service functions
policies.1: We will not use your data for any commercial promotion purposes
policies.2: Your data will not be leaked or sold to any third parties
policies.4: You can delete your account and related data at any time

privacy.footer: For more details, please check our complete privacy policy. If you have any questions, please contact us at any time.

subscription.title: Subscription Information
subscription.freePlanDesc: You are using the free plan and enjoying all basic features

about.title: About VideoRoll Pro
about.description: VideoRoll Pro is a powerful video download browser extension that supports multiple video formats and websites.
